14 days ago

NYS - Youth Participant - Cricket South Africa - Impala Hub - North West

Cricket South Africa
Member since Mar 2022
Sponsored by: NYDA Phase 3

Role description

As a National Youth Service Participant, you may be responsible for one of the following:

  • Hub Coaches 
  • Administrators 
  • Marketing

- Coaches: Coaching Cricket players at the hub and feeder schools.

- Administrators: Assist the Hub head coach with communicating with the school teachers, hub assistant coaches, players, and parents about the programs taking place at the hub. Assist in submitting scorecards to the hub head coaches.

- Umpires: Officiate cricket matches for the hub teams when they play matches internally and externally.

 If selected, you'll join a WhatsApp-based learning adventure called "Make Your Own Money". The goal is to give the knowledge and tools to earn money during and after the program.

Role requirement

Requirements :

  • Coaching cricket.
  • fixture setting/control.
  • umpiring during games.
  • 18 to 35 years age.
  • SA Citizen.
  • Unemployed. 
  • No Criminal record        

Benefits

Team Leaders will receive R1848

Role description

This text is from another website. For a better description, go to the website to read more.

We are looking for a Merchandiser to join our team!


As a Merchandiser, you need to make sure that a store's shelves are filled with the right products, they look good, and they're priced correctly to attract customers and boost sales. Think of it as making the store look nice and helping products sell better.


  • This position requires you to work between multiple stores within a specific area.
  • You will be required to have your own smartphone in order to be considered for the position.

  • Kindly note that internal candidates or candidates with previous experience at Smollan will be prioritised.

blogPosts.details:
3 days ago

In - Store Brand Ambassador: Rustenburg Mall

Edge
Member since Feb 2021

Role description

What is this job all about?

As a Client Brand Ambassador, employed by Edge Field Marketing (the Company) you will be assigned to work within a selected retail store.  Your main focus is to provide our Client product information to potential customers and to achieve daily targets.

Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:

  • Actively promoting the Client's brand to customers.

  • Providing customers with information or assistance on the use of the Clients’ channels.

Role requirement

Are you someone who thrives on the thrill of connecting with potential customers? Do you find the world of sales exciting, and are you always eager to push the boundaries to achieve your targets? If you answered "yes" to these questions, then we have an exciting opportunity waiting for you!

Why Choose Us? At Edge Field Marketing, we believe in fostering a dynamic and supportive sales environment that encourages growth, creativity, and success. We're on the lookout for enthusiastic individuals who are ready to embark on a rewarding journey with us.

What We Offer:

  • Extensive Training

  • Supportive Team

  • Fun and Inclusive Culture

Here's what we're looking for in our ideal candidate:

  • Education: A matric qualification is required to demonstrate your commitment to personal growth and development.

  • Unemployed: We're looking for dedicated individuals who are ready to commit their full energy and focus to this role.

  • Availability: You must be available to work 5 days a week, ensuring your commitment to achieving our sales targets.

  • Educational Commitments: We understand the importance of your education, so we require candidates who are not currently involved in any study or learnership programs that may require you to take extended leave.

  • Physical Stamina: This role requires you to be on your feet all day, every day, so physical fitness is essential.

  • Location: You should reside within 15km of the area advertised, allowing for easy access to our workplace.

Ready to elevate your sales career? Apply now by completing the following steps: 

  • Apply here through SAYouth

  • Complete the relevant assessments

  • Complete a video/telephonic interview with one of our recruiters

  • If successful, attend a 2 day bridge/training programme 

IMPORTANT NOTE: Due to the high volumes of applications, kindly consider your application as unsuccessful if you have not been contacted within 4 weeks. 

Edge Field Marketing is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Disclaimer: By supplying Edge Field Marketing your personal information, you agree that your information will be stored according to the requirements of the POPIA Act.

Benefits

  • Group Life Cover.

  • Employee Assistance Programme.

  • Training and development.

Support

Experience and Skills:

  • Age between 18-35 (Required).

  • Experience in planning and implementing peer-based activities for young people (beneficial).
  • Understanding of English (required) and proficiency in any other South African language.
  • No criminal Record .

Nandos Rusternburg CBD General assistant

Nando's South Africa

Role description

We are looking for a vibrant person to perform overall cleaning procedures and food preparation as required, and completion of various other tasks as specified by management, in accordance with the Nando’s operational standards.

NB: For you to qualify for this position you need to be able to be on your feet for 8 hours or more, be able to work shifts and weekends ie: (Day and night shifts) 

KEY PERFORMANCE AREAS

  • To ensure overall cleanliness and tidiness of the restaurant
  • To perform opening and closing procedures in accordance with the laid down standards
  • To prepare required products in accordance with the production planning and Nando’s operational standards
  • To adhere to the health and safety procedures and Nando’s operational standards
  • To adhere to Nando’s food safety standards
  • To improve service levels by applying the 4 Customer Care Principles
  • To fulfill the role of the Waitron / Back Griller / Front Griller when required
  • To perform any other duties as required from time to time

Role requirement

NB: For you to qualify for this position you need to be able to be on your feet for 8 hours or more, be able to work shifts and weekends ie: (Day and night shifts) 

Must reside in 

Tlhabane Noord, Tlhabane West, Gealhout, Sunrise Park, Meriting, Boitekong,and Rustenburg CBD

blogPosts.details:
19 days ago

NYS - Youth Participant - Southern African Association of Youth Club - 0340 Business Stand, Rustenburg - North West

Be there 4 Me
Member since Sep 2021
Sponsored by: NYDA Phase 3

Role description

The National Youth Service (NYS) is a South African government initiative designed to engage youth in community service, aiming to enhance service delivery, foster patriotism, promote nation-building, and strengthen social cohesion. In partnership with the Southern African Association of Youth Clubs (SAAYC) and Youth Build South Africa (YBSA), the National Youth Development Agency (NYDA) provides administrative support to the NYS. Recognizing the significant benefits of youth volunteering,

The NYDA seeks to combat high youth unemployment by offering young people the opportunity to serve 16 hours weekly in their communities. Participants will apply their existing skills while acquiring new ones, gaining valuable experience that can lead to better career opportunities. The program includes comprehensive training in orientation, life skills, and work readiness, preparing youth for successful transitions into sustainable livelihoods and personal development.

If selected, you'll join a WhatsApp-based learning adventure called "Make Your Own Money." The goal is to give the knowledge and tools to earn money during and after the programme. 

Role requirement

  • South African youth between the age of 18 to 34 (not 34+) years to qualify.
  • Preference will be given to young people not in Employment, Education and in Training (NEET cohort), only Out-of-school young people.
  • Have minimum of grade 11 qualification with either pure Math or Math literacy and can read and write English.
  • Have full South African documents (Identity document, existing proof of bank account and proof of residential).
  • Have never participated and/or served on the previous NYS Phases.

Support

  • Complete a video/telephonic interview with one of our recruiters

  • If successful, attend a 2 day bridge/training programme 

IMPORTANT NOTE: Due to the high volumes of applications, kindly consider your application as unsuccessful if you have not been contacted within 4 weeks. 

Edge Field Marketing is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Disclaimer: By supplying Edge Field Marketing your personal information, you agree that your information will be stored according to the requirements of the POPIA Act.

Benefits

  • Group Life Cover.

  • Employee Assistance Programme.

  • Training and development.

District Sales Manager - FMCG

RPO Recruitment
Rustenburg, North West
blogPosts.details:
21 days ago

District Sales Manager - FMCG

RPO Recruitment
Data needed to apply

Role description

This text is from another website. For a better description, go to the website to read more.
RPO Recruitment is currently seeking a highly motivated and experienced District Sales Manager to join our client, a leading FMCG company, based in Rustenburg. As a District Sales Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the sales performance of a designated district, managing a team of sales representatives, and driving business growth in your assigned area. The successful candidate will have a proven track record in FMCG sales, excellent leadership skills, and a passion for achieving targets and driving results. Responsibilities: Manage and lead a team of sales representatives to achieve sales targets and objectives in the assigned district. Develop and execute sales strategies to drive business growth. Build and maintain relationships with key customers and stakeholders. Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to identify opportunities for growth. Analyze sales data and performance metrics to assess performance and make strategic decisions. Provide coaching and training to the sales team to enhance their skills and performance. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure effective execution of sales plans. Prepare and present regular sales reports and forecasts to senior management. Requirements Minimum of 5 years of experience in sales, preferably in the FMCG industry. Proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving business growth. Strong leadership and team management skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to analyze sales data and market trends to inform decision-making. Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field. Proficiency in MS Office Suite. Willingness to travel within the assigned district as required. Benefits Salary negotiable Contact RPO Recruitment for your next career opportunity. Our client is offering a highly competitive salary for this role based on experience. Apply for this role today, contact Jamie-lee McCallum at RPO Recruitment or on LinkedIn You can also visit the RPO Recruitment website: rporecruitment.us or email us your CV: logisticsrpo-recruit.za.com ​ We will contact you telephonically in 3 days should you be suitable for this vacancy. If you are not suitable, we will put your CV on file and contact you regarding any future vacancies that arise.

Part-Time Sales Assistant

PEP South Africa
Rustenburg, North West
blogPosts.details:
New

Part-Time Sales Assistant

PEP South Africa
Data needed to apply

Role description

This text is from another website. For a better description, go to the website to read more.

Join PEP as a Part-Time Sales Assistant - a culture of growth and development, with the opportunity to work up to 27 hours a week. At PEP, we're known as Dynamos - we work hard, have fun, and take pride in everything we do. As a Dynamo, you'll be dynamic, helpful, and committed to ensuring our customers look and feel great.


Purpose of Position:

As a friendly team player, your role involves promoting sales, minimising stock losses, managing inventory, assisting customers, operating the cash register, and upholding a low-cost culture to achieve business objectives. At PEP, we nurture a culture that encourages our team members to grow from within, offering chances for professional development and advancement within the company. This helps our team thrive and realise their full potential.


If this sounds like you and you want to be part of the PEP family, apply through the JOBJACK platform, where we find our new team members. It's really important that you're honest and trustworthy, especially when it comes to handling money.


*The position requires honesty in dealing with cash or finance.

blogPosts.details:
19 days ago

NYS - Youth Participant - Southern African Association of Youth Club - No 1242 Monnakato Rustenburg - North West

Ikage Foundation
Member since Sep 2021
Sponsored by: NYDA Phase 3

Role description

The National Youth Service (NYS) is a South African government initiative designed to engage youth in community service, aiming to enhance service delivery, foster patriotism, promote nation-building, and strengthen social cohesion. In partnership with the Southern African Association of Youth Clubs (SAAYC) and Youth Build South Africa (YBSA), the National Youth Development Agency (NYDA) provides administrative support to the NYS. Recognizing the significant benefits of youth volunteering,

The NYDA seeks to combat high youth unemployment by offering young people the opportunity to serve 16 hours weekly in their communities. Participants will apply their existing skills while acquiring new ones, gaining valuable experience that can lead to better career opportunities. The program includes comprehensive training in orientation, life skills, and work readiness, preparing youth for successful transitions into sustainable livelihoods and personal development.

If selected, you'll join a WhatsApp-based learning adventure called "Make Your Own Money." The goal is to give the knowledge and tools to earn money during and after the programme. 

 

Role requirement

  • South African youth between the age of 18 to 34 (not 34+) years to qualify.
  • Preference will be given to young people not in Employment, Education and in Training (NEET cohort), only Out-of-school young people.
  • Have minimum of grade 11 qualification with either pure Math or Math literacy and can read and write English.
  • Have full South African documents (Identity document, existing proof of bank account and proof of residential).
  • Have never participated and/or served on the previous NYS Phases.

Support

blogPosts.details:
13 days ago

NYS - Youth Participant - Sport For Social Change Network - North West (Cyferskuil)

Mavu Sports
Member since Apr 2022
Sponsored by: NYDA Phase 3

Role description

As part of the Mavu after school sport programme, the coach will be responsible for introducing and implementing after school sports at a primary school.

If selected, you'll join a WhatsApp-based learning adventure called "Make Your Own Money." The goal is to give the knowledge and tools to earn money during and after the programme.

Role requirement

Educational:

  • Grade 12 (beneficial).

Experience and Skills:

  • Live in or near tthe primary school.
  • Age between 18-35 (Required).
  • Experience working in youth development programs (beneficial).
  • Experience in planning and implementing peer-based activities for young people (beneficial).
  • Understanding of English (required) and proficiency in any other South African language.
  • No criminal Record .

blogPosts.details:
17 days ago

NYS - Youth Participant - Sport For Social Change Network - Western Cape(Schaapkraal )

Oasis 'Reach For Your Dreams"
Member since Apr 2022
Sponsored by: NYDA Phase 3

Role description

We believe sport and active health can change lives and make the world a better place.

Sports and Recreation, Community Work:

Oasis 'Reach For Your Dreams"is looking for a  Gardening facilitator /mentor  , focusing on Sports and Recreation and Community Work initiatives like school gardens. Establish a supportive culture, promote programs through various channels, mobilize and engage young people, plan and implement engaging activities, contribute to program development and improvement, and implement standard operating procedures.

We seek an individual with a passion for empowering young people, experience in sports and recreation or community work, and the ability to plan and implement engaging activities, with a deep commitment to creating positive change and building strong relationships with young people. 

If selected, you'll join a WhatsApp-based learning adventure called "Make Your Own Money." The goal is to give the knowledge and tools to earn money after the contract ends. 

Role requirement

  • Must be between the Ages of 18-34.
  • Must live in or around the area and have an in-depth understanding of the community.
  • Must be able to work with children and youth.
  • Must be willing to work in garden and be open to learning.
  • Must know a bit about gardening.
  • Must not have a criminal Record.
  • Must not be studying full time.
  • Must be unemployed.

Support

Role description

Sports and Recreation, Community Work:

Oasis 'Reach For Your Dreams"is looking for a Community Sports  facilitator  , focusing on Sports and Recreation and Community Work initiatives like school gardens. Establish a supportive culture, promote programs through various channels, mobilize and engage young people, plan and implement engaging activities, contribute to program development and improvement, and implement standard operating procedures.

We seek an individual with a passion for empowering young people, experience in sports and recreation or community work, and the ability to plan and implement engaging activities, with a deep commitment to creating positive change and building strong relationships with young people. 

If selected, you'll join a WhatsApp-based learning adventure called "Make Your Own Money." The goal is to give the knowledge and tools to earn money after the contract ends.

blogPosts.details:
14 days ago

NYS - Youth Participant - Cricket South Africa - Berseba Center - North West

Cricket South Africa
Member since Mar 2022
Sponsored by: NYDA Phase 3

Role description

As a National Youth Service Participant, you may be responsible for one of the following:

  • Hub Coaches 
  • Administrators 
  • Marketing

- Coaches: Coaching Cricket players at the hub and feeder schools.

- Administrators: Assist the Hub head coach with communicating with the school teachers, hub assistant coaches, players, and parents about the programs taking place at the hub. Assist in submitting scorecards to the hub head coaches.

- Umpires: Officiate cricket matches for the hub teams when they play matches internally and externally.

 If selected, you'll join a WhatsApp-based learning adventure called "Make Your Own Money". The goal is to give the knowledge and tools to earn money during and after the program.

Role requirement

Requirements :

  • Coaching cricket.
  • fixture setting/control.
  • umpiring during games.
  • 18 to 35 years age.
  • SA Citizen.
  • Unemployed. 
  • No Criminal record        

Benefits

Team Leaders will receive R1848

Merchandiser TFS63 - Mooinooi

Smollan
Mooinooi, North West
blogPosts.details:
18 days ago

Merchandiser TFS63 - Mooinooi

Smollan
Data needed to apply

Role description

This text is from another website. For a better description, go to the website to read more.

We are looking for a Merchandiser to join our team!


As a Merchandiser, you need to make sure that a store's shelves are filled with the right products, they look good, and they're priced correctly to attract customers and boost sales. Think of it as making the store look nice and helping products sell better.


  • This position requires you to work between multiple stores within a specific area.
  • You will be required to have your own smartphone in order to be considered for the position.
  • You will be required to upload copies of your Matric Certificate, ID, SARS Letter and Bank Confirmation Letter onto the JOBJACK platform when shortlisted, please note no one will reach out over social media to request your personal documents.
  • The Fixed Term contract and duration will be discussed during the interview.
